game.name: Armored Warriors Cyberbots
game.desc: In the year 2281, the United Earth Government and the Principalities of Raia signed a ceasefire treaty, ending a war that lasted for half a century. One year after the signing of the treaty, the United Earth Government's 18th scouting party reported that the Raian capital, Melkide, has been captured by an army of unknown origin. The United Earth Government decided to dispatch an army to Raia to retake the capital and rescue its citizens. However, unbeknownst to the general public, the true purpose of this operation was to eliminate the unknown enemy and bring Raia under Earth's control.

game.name: City of Heroes - Episode 1
game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters from DC

game.name: Art Of Fighting -bor Remix 3
game.desc: This is based off of the original fighting game Art of Fighting that comes to a Beat Em Up tradition. Ryo Sakazaki hears that his father, Takuma, is killed (supposedly), and missing. Even his sister, Yuri, is kidnapped. So he contacts Robert Garcia and talked to him about it.

game.name: City Of Heroes
game.desc: In City of Heroes, play as a superhero and fight the bad guys. Sometimes the DC comics universe, sometimes from the Marvel universe, choose between around twenty crime fighters and let justice prevail!

game.path: ./Marvel vs DC Comics and Image (Chapter 1 Hydra).pak
game.name: City Of Heroes
game.desc: In City of Heroes, play as a superhero and fight the bad guys. Sometimes the DC comics universe, sometimes from the Marvel universe, choose between around twenty crime fighters and let justice prevail!

game.name: Contra - Locked N Loaded
game.desc: This mod is an attempt to remake Contra, one of top classic games, with OpenBoR. It's not 100% remade but at least basic and important gameplay is remade Modes: 3 missions, 1 locked mission & 1 locked boss rush mode Soldiers : Bill Rizer, Brad Fang, Probotector, Sheena Etranzi, Mad Dog, Bahamut & Lucia Abilities: - Shoot in 8 direction - Slide (no invincibility though) - Platform drop (disabled in some levels) - Free and fixed shooting mode - Carry 2 weapons but only use one everytime Disabilities: - Unable to climb walls - Unable to hang to railing - Unable to fire 2 weapons at same time Features: - 12 different weapons - Health bar which gives 3 hit points for player - Health item to restore health - Motorbike mode - Plenty pseudo travel levels both horizontal and vertical - Challenging bosses and subbosses - Save game is enabled for all missions but Boss Rush This mod uses 4 buttons, don't forget to define key for each! Bahamut has similar ability as the other soldiers for balance. His sprites are made by slash128

game.name: Double Dragon 3 - The Dragon Stone
game.desc: An enjoyable game developed by gabo hanzo , this open bor game is full of special moves that make the old double dragon 3 a decent game to have fun! So what add this remake to the old technos saga? 3 characters gameplay lots of new skills rearranged graphics from the past double dragon games arranged music

game.name: Dungeons And Dragons - Knights And Dragons - The Endless Quest
Dungeons And Dragons - Rise Of Warduke
Final Fight - The Last Round
game.desc: There are three versions (only 3rd version is 4player): The first version contains characters from Final Fight 1 & 2: Guy, Cody, Haggar, Maki & Carlos The second version features the complete character cast from Final Fight 3: Guy, Haggar, Lucia & Dean In the original Final Fight: The Last Round all of these were hidden extra characters. The third version was a Dreamcast exclusive 4 player version of Final Fight: The Last Round that features the Street Fighter characters (players & bosses!) from Hyper Final Fight 1 & 2: Guy, Cody, Cammy, Guile, DeeJay & Fei Long Bosses: Vega, Bison, Sagat, Balrog & Rolento

game.name: Final Fight Hyper 1
game.desc: An excellent mod featuring all the nice graphics, sounds and characters from Final Fight.

game.name: Megaman - The Power War (ep1)
game.desc: The first of a series of mods. Classic MegaMan style gameplay, arcade style fun! Fight your way to Wily in this MegaMan: Power Battle/Fighters inspired mod. Includes 5 playable characters, each with helpers that can be summoned. Based on MegaMan 1.

game.name: Megaman - War Of The Past
game.desc: Megaman: War Of The Past has the unique distinction of being the first fully completed Beats of Rage mod. Created by DCSteve in 2004, the mod displayed many features which would lead the way for even more enhancements to the original game module. The mod also influenced the further development of the Beats of Rage game engine, which eventually became OpenBoR.

game.name: Megaman Armada
game.desc: MegaMan Armada is a MegaMan game by fans, for fans! Grab three friends and jump-and-shoot your way through several familiar levels--remixed for 4-player arcade action! Tired of playing as the Blue Bomber? Then take on the Robot Masters as Mario, Solid Snake, Vegeta, and many other characters!

game.name: Metal Slug - Resistance
game.desc: Choose between two characters from the Metal Slug saga and battle a horde of enemies in this Beat'Em-Up / Run and Gun created by fans, for fans. Explosive atmosphere at the rendezvous.

game.name: Neon Lightning Force
game.desc: The year is 2044. After the events of world war 3, the United States and European Union are no more, so utterly devastated they were by the nuclear fallout. the power vacuum in northern America gave rise to the "Pacific Union", with Neopolis as it's capital in South America. While the world is still at peace, the Neopolis police still fights the crimes in it's city, even as they are getting more violent by the day. They send a special agent, Isolde Shinwara, to investigate those cases finding traces of drako, a drug that makes a person stronger and aggressive. As follows the case, she will find it leads to a much more dangerous, and corrupt, path that was originally thought...

game.name: Pocket Dimensional Clash
game.desc: Pocket Dimensional Clash is a 2D action fighting beat-'em-up that features characters from the Capcom, Sega, and Nintendo universes.

game.name: Power Rangers - Beats Of Power
game.desc: The game is designed as a retro throwback to classic 1990s Power Rangers games such as the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers games for the SNES and the Genesis and Power Rangers: The Fighting Edition. In March of 2017, the game was updated with a Special Edition version released.

game.name: Rainbow
game.desc: Fly your way through shape based dungeons and shoot colored shapes with same colored beam. Correct beam will destroy them while wrong one will have side effect depending on the shape. Avoid the shapes, get powerups and survive! Can you destroy the shapes and survive 5 stages in this challenging colorful adventure? Version1 was made for Shoot'em up Jam. Version 2 is the post jam and updated version

game.name: Return Of The Double Dragon
game.desc: Return of Double Dragon is a Beats of Rage Mod tribute to the Technos Japan series of beat 'em up games that originated back in 1987. The original Double Dragon games spanned over some classic consoles including the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES), Sega Master System (SMS), Atari 2600, Nintendo Game Boy, Sega Genesis / Mega Drive and Atari Lynx. "This really is a must-have; even for people who never played Double Dragon before. It features the original plot that this game was supposed to have, but sadly got cut into the versions we all know..." - Mr.Q

game.name: Rhythm Of Destruction 1 Black
game.desc: Also known as Beats of Rage Remix, this is a BoR mod created by Mr.Q!. It is based on the original Beats of Rage and contains new music, different stages and different characters.

game.name: Rhythm Of Destruction 2 - Street Fighter Edition
game.desc: Rhythm of Destruction comes in four different PAKs and uses the original BoR engine, not OpenBoR. It took almost 7 months to complete and features a total of 16 playable characters. Street Fighter Version - Featuring SF Remixes (KH & Q) Ryu Ken Guile Dhalsim Chun Li Yun

game.name: Road Rash Revolution
game.desc: Road Rash Revolution is a Beats of Rage mod created by Predator002 and is based on the classic Road Rash videogame series for Mega Drive / Genesis. The mod put a unique twist to the conventional BoR games being created at the time - it turned the mod world on its side, literally.

game.name: Sailor Moon Alternate Story - Clone Attack
Skull Kingz Remake
game.desc: - 4 player co-op - 5 playable characters - Brand New Story - More Boss Fights - Unlockable Gallery Mode/ with hand drawn artwork! - 10 chapters - New Gameplay with more combos! - Complete Story/Ending - new sprite edits

game.name: Sonic Liberations (saturday Morning Cartoon)
game.desc: Sonic SatAM Liberations is a 4-player fan game based on the 1993 American TV series, Sonic The Hedgehog--better known as Sonic SatAM. It's primarily developed by NickyP, and co-developed by DJGameFreakTheIguana (developer of Sega Brawlers Megamix). The game features six playable characters, several Zones with two Acts each, and clips from the actual TV series as cutscenes in-game. There are three game modes: Story, Arcade, and Character Profiles. Story Mode is the game as it was intended, with cutscenes and all. Arcade Mode is identical to Story, but without the cutscenes. And Character Profiles will let you view a brief history of the main cast to familiarize yourself with the series.

game.name: Splatterhouse 1 Deception Of The Mask
game.desc: 4 playable characters new moves and specials for every Rick version 10 stages, 19 substages 19 different enemies + 10 Bosses

game.name: Splatterhouse 2 Journey Through Hell
game.desc: 4 playable characters new moves and specials for every Rick version 6 long stages 23 different enemies + 6 Bosses

game.name: Splatterhouse 3 Back To Light
game.desc: 4 playable characters new moves and specials for every Rick version 6 long stages 28 different enemies + 6 Bosses

game.name: Street Fighter Ultimate Collection
game.desc: Street Fighter Ultimate Collection is considered to be one of the best fan made games in the origin series. There are over 12 character can be selectable include Namco's bonuhttps://streetfighter.fandom.com/wiki/Forum:Street_Fighter_Ultimate_Collections character is added in the bonus game. The download only available for the members since it was the 10th collectors of Ericard Production game made.

game.name: Vermilion Sword - The Legend Of Calibur
World Heroes - Supreme Justice Extra
game.desc: World Heroes Supreme Justice Extra is a classic side scroller arcade beat 'em up where you fight against the forces of Zeus and Neo-Dio. World Heroes Supreme Justice Extra has five playable characters + 6 secret characters to unlock plus features two player co-op. The game uses 4 buttons to punch, kick, jump and block as well as a lot of special moves, combos, and Kick/Punch combos.

game.name: X-men
game.desc: X-Men is a Beats of Rage mod created by VicViper & Kungpow, it features the Marvel superhero team which includes Iceman, Jean Grey, Psylocke and Wolverine.

game.name: X-men
game.desc: X-Men is a Beats of Rage mod created by VicViper & Kungpow, it features the Marvel superhero team which includes Iceman, Jean Grey, Psylocke and Wolverine.

Vampires Rage
game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters from Vampires Rage

game.name: X-men Guerra Dos Clones
game.desc: This game follows the story of the original, but with changes in characters because of the style of play. These characters will be selectable: nightcrawler, storm, cyclops, beast, gambit, wolverine and magneto.

game.name: Airgallet Fighters Wing
game.desc: New enemy declarated wold war III , japan has been invaded , rest of the world has also been invaded, two pilots the team airgallet is not enough ,to combat the threat the general the navy battleship morita kaisaku, orders, finding new pilots to save the world, the elect are shin kazama and mike simon team u.n scuadron, mao mao and malcom team aerofighters, together to defeat the invaders ,to restore world peace.

game.name: Aliens Clash
game.desc: 2 Alien races have clashed for years, the winner will be decided by the champion of each race Play as the champion of a race. Travel and shoot your way through different worlds and levels. Win your race and defeat the other champion!

game.name: Asterix And Caesars Challenge
game.desc: You accompany Asterix and Obelix in their adventures. The game is set up like the old school Batman Returns or King of Dragons. You have an energy bar and use it to perform 2 different attacks and beat the Roman army. You should not forget to jump occasionally as it is helps you to progress in the game.

game.name: Battle Arena Toshinden Origin
game.desc: Beat'em all based on the world of Toshinden (PlayStation). The game is very nervous with a lot of enemies.

game.path: ./Battletoads & Double Dragon IV - The Return of the Dark Forces.pak
game.name: Battletoads And Double Dragon Iv - The Return Of The Dark Forces
game.desc: Faraway, at the very end of this galaxy there is another world race of the galaxy “Canis Major” corporation ruled by Queen of Dark. Defeated Queen of Dark is full of rage and makes up new evil plans of revenge and conquest. She destroyed all fighting units in Oxnard, where battle toads live. She did this with the help of magic and her faithful warriors. The city was at Queen's feet after that. Battletoads and Double Dragon mean the last hope. You must make your way to the Queen of Dark and destroy her with the help of set of fighting skills of each fighter. You are going to experience a hurricane beat'em up with classic characters, improved graphics and nice sound effects. There are also extra game modes available: boss battle and air motorbike races.
game.image: /home/pi/addonusb/roms/openbor/mixart/Battletoads & Double Dragon IV - The Return of the Dark Forces.png
game.video: /home/pi/addonusb/roms/openbor/snap/Battletoads & Double Dragon IV - The Return of the Dark Forces.mp4
game.marquee: /home/pi/addonusb/roms/openbor/wheel/Battletoads & Double Dragon IV - The Return of the Dark Forces.png

game.name: Battletoads Double Dragon - The T.bird Mission
game.desc: This is a new part of a famous crossover with the participation of characters from the game series Battletoads and Double Dragon!nnnnThree human-like toads, Rash, Zitz, Pimple and dragon brothers Billy and Jimmy Lee must save professor T. Bird in their new adventures. He is a teacher and a master of the toads, who was kidnapped by the Queen of Dark, who rules Ragnarok planet. It is going to be a really serious battle, toads and dragons will have to fight against numerous enemies and bosses, which are sent by the Queen of Dark. Moreover, evil Queen called Shadow Boss to help her, they act as one team. Choose one of three toads or one of two dragons and conquer the space with the help of your fists!nnThere are 9 different missions in this game, each of them is divided into several parts.

game.name: Beats Of Rage Alliance Super Sayan
Beats Of Rage Original
game.desc: Beats of Rage is a customisable video game engine made by Senile Team and inspired by Sega's classic Streets of Rage series. With Beats of Rage, users can create their own beat 'em up games - no programming experience required!nnnnBeats of Rage was first released for DOS in November 2003. It was not advertised in any way other than by word of mouth, yet it soon gained enormous popularity. Ports to many other systems (e.g. Dreamcast, Linux, Windows, GP32, GP2X, etc) soon followed.nn

game.name: Beats Of Rage Xtra
game.desc: A new version of Beats of Rage with 4 additional characters: Rock, Mai, Terry / Bogard, Evy / Vanessa

game.name: Captain Commando And The Avengers
game.desc: Captain Commando and The Avengers is a Beats of Rage mod created by Gabo-Hanzo which features the superhero from Capcom fighting alongside the Marvel characters. NOTE: Check 'How To Play' in the game menu for further instructions with the extra character moves available with this BoR mod.

game.name: Clafan - Classic Fantasy
game.desc: Retro-styled, semi-open world, RPG beat 'em up hybrid! Choose a character, and go on an adventure! Up to 4 players.

game.name: Clafan Advanced - Classic Fantasy Advanced
game.desc: ClaFan Advanced is the spiritual successor to ClaFan - Classic Fantasy. But that does not mean it's a sequel, nor is it a replacement for the original. ClaFan and ClaFan Advanced are entirely separate games. ClaFan Advanced is called that way for a reason. It makes a number of big improvements on ClaFan's gameplay system. Here are some notable changes: The HUD is reduced, the playfield is increased, and enemy lifebars now appear over enemies themselves. Player attack width and range are almost double what they were in original ClaFan--so it's much easier to hit things now. All characters have: a standard 5-hit combo, an aerial combo, a neutral Chain attack, and a mid-combo Chain attack. Melee characters have a secondary mid-combo Chain, as well as an aerial Chain. Magic characters can cast two different spells, assigned to the Magic1 and Magic2 buttons accordingly. The goal in ClaFan Advanced is to build a stronger emotional connection between the player and the NPC's they are helping. Hopefully, each quest will be bigger and more substantive; almost as if each one is a mini-game in itself. Of course, ambitions are just that: ambitious--and I'm only a one-man show. So it's possible that the quests in ClaFan Advanced will have about the same level of substance as the ones in the original game. Either way, you won't be disappointed.

game.name: Crisis Evil 1
game.desc: This is a 2D version of Capcom's popular survival horror game Resident Evil. Play as Chris Redfield or Jill Valentine, blasting and fighting zombies, mutant dogs and other creatures.nnnnThe game mods feature the characters from the Resident Evil game series, not only are the good guys here... the Zombies, Dogs, Plants, Spiders, and even the Nemesis is here!

game.name: Crisis Evil 3 - Santiago Infected
game.desc: Crisis Evil 3: Santiago Infected is a Beat'em Up game, based on the Resident Evil saga of Capcom. It is the third part of the Openbor Crisis Evil saga, which this time places the action in a hypothetical zombie invasion in the city of Santiago, Chile, because of the mutation of the H1N1 virus. Leon and Claire from Resident Evil, along with some other Capcom characters, must face the threat by cleaning the city of monsters, zombies and other horrible creatures perpetrated by Umbrella.

game.name: Double Dragon 3 - The Dragon Stone
game.desc: An enjoyable game developed by gabo hanzo , this open bor game is full of special moves that make the old double dragon 3 a decent game to have fun! So what add this remake to the old technos saga? 3 characters gameplay lots of new skills rearranged graphics from the past double dragon games arranged music

game.name: Double Dragon Extreme
game.desc: This mod is a fantastic piece of work that feature remakes of the arcade version of Double Dragon 1 and 2 and the NES version of Double Dragon 2. The game features three fighting styles and its a matter of opinion on which one is the best suited for you.

game.name: Dungeons And Dragons - Knights And Dragons - The Endless Quest
Dungeons And Dragons - Rise Of Warduke
Ed, Edd, N Eddy - Nightmare On Ed Street
game.desc: Ed Edd n Eddy: Nightmare on Ed Street is a Beats of Rage mod created by Kungpow and features the characters from the Cartoon Network show traveling through various levels of previously created BoR mods.

game.name: Elfen Lied
game.desc: Elfen Lied is a Beats of Rage mod created by Kelvinblue and is based on the Japanese Manga series created by Lynn Okamoto. WARNING: This game contains animated nudity.

game.name: Fatal Fury Final
game.desc: According to SEEP, Fatal Fury Final is a remake of the original fighting game made SNK but in beat em up style. The detail including the characters are developed as close as possible to the Neo Geo but twists it up as you can play as the heroes or as the bosses. Also included is your own path such as South Town Quest or the original The King of Fighters Tournament.

game.name: Fatal Fury Re Bout
game.desc: Fatal Fury Final: Re-Bout is a remake of the original fighting game made SNK but in beat em up style.All retro neo geo look in one cool fan made game. You can play as heroes or as bosses, choose your path in the South Town Quest mode or play a the original The King of Fighters tournament.

game.name: Fatal Fury Re-bout 2
game.desc: This Game is first work by S.E.E.P. Team. The Game-Play is Classic of BOR Engine and the Graphics and Sound is taken from original Fatal Fury 1. Characters; Terry Bogard, Andy Bogard, Joe Higashi, Tung Fu Rue. Boss; Duck King, Richard Mayer, Michael Max, Hwa Jay, Raiden, Billy Kane and Geese Howard... and Much More on Secret Modes.

game.name: Final Fight - The Last Round
game.desc: There are three versions (only 3rd version is 4player): The first version contains characters from Final Fight 1 & 2: Guy, Cody, Haggar, Maki & Carlos The second version features the complete character cast from Final Fight 3: Guy, Haggar, Lucia & Dean In the original Final Fight: The Last Round all of these were hidden extra characters. The third version was a Dreamcast exclusive 4 player version of Final Fight: The Last Round that features the Street Fighter characters (players & bosses!) from Hyper Final Fight 1 & 2: Guy, Cody, Cammy, Guile, DeeJay & Fei Long Bosses: Vega, Bison, Sagat, Balrog & Rolento

game.name: Final Fight Alpha
game.desc: Final Fight Aplha is a fan game which is heavily based on the well-known Capcom saga and Street Fighter Alpha series. The result is a pretty good beat em' up with a really cool graphics and a classic-soldid gameplay. The game, created with the OpenBOR engine, includes 8 characters which you can select (and much more secrets), four of which are from the Street Fighter saga. Each one of them has their own special moves and they all have to go through 8 stages with many different enemies and bosses to defeat. Do you think you can stop the evil project of Shadowlaw?

game.name: Final Fight Apocalypse - 2nd Edition
game.desc: 4 playable characters - Haggar, Cody, Guy and Scorp (from Saturday Nite Slam Masters) 4-player simultaneous gameplay Tons of special moves for each character, as well as useable weapons (uncommon for most BOR mods) Challenging enemies who block, teleport and won't hesitate to throw you around!

game.name: Final Fight Hyper 1
game.desc: An excellent mod featuring all the nice graphics, sounds and characters from Final Fight.

game.name: Final Fight Hyper 2
game.desc: 1 single story + boss rush. A mod technically superior to HFF1! - 6 playable characters: Haggar, Cody, Guy, Lucia, Carlos and DeeJay! - New and deadly enemies and bosses! - 7 challenging stages, bringing new stuff to BoR experience! - EX Boss Rush mode (finish the game to unlock!) - New cinemas!

game.name: Final Fight Vs King Of Fighters

game.path: ./Final Fight meets Comics Zone and Battletoads.pak
game.name: Final Fight X Battletoads
game.image: /home/pi/addonusb/roms/openbor/mixart/Final Fight meets Comics Zone and Battletoads.png
game.video: /home/pi/addonusb/roms/openbor/snap/Final Fight meets Comics Zone and Battletoads.mp4
game.marquee: /home/pi/addonusb/roms/openbor/wheel/Final Fight meets Comics Zone and Battletoads.png

game.name: Fire Emblem Castle Defense
game.desc: An action tower defense game; the very first of its kind on OpenBOR! 11 characters to choose from, 2 game modes, 2 unlockable modes, and lots of fun.

game.name: Golden Axe Curse Of Death Adder
Golden Axe Genesis
game.desc: This release is a tribute to the Golden Axe series of games released for the Sega Mega Drive, which was known as the Sega Genesis in America. Features -13 different playable characters -4 hidden characters -3 game modes (Story, Original and The Duel) -Story Mode with multiple routes -A total of 21 stages -The Duel with 20 missions and 15 exclusive arenas -More than 20 different enemies -Three beasts to ride -Exclusive features for each character -1 to 4 players simultaneously -Original Soundtrack

game.name: Guilty Gear The Crusades
game.desc: A decent OpenBOR game that's based on Guilty Gear. The graphics are a bit on the mediocre side, since the GG characters are missing frames of animation, the enemies are "familiar", and the game has the default physics, but if you can get past these aspects it's alright. Playable characters: Sol Badguy, Ky Kiske, Potemkin, Baiken, Hayato (Star Gladiator), Ceil (Melty Blood)

game.name: Halloween - The Wrath Of Michael Myers
Hiryu No Ken
game.desc: -4 characters: Rick, Willer, Hayato, Mary -gameplay same the original -long game -many skills -'coz the bug in copy files the boss "blue" was out -transformation!

game.name: Ikari Warriors 2010
game.desc: Ikari Warriors 2010 is the spiritual successor of POW 2010. Like POW 2010, Ikari Warriors 2010 have a look ispirated from The King of Fighters series and a solid combat batle system. This is a fan made spin off of the original SNK saga created with OpenBOR engine, allow choose three heroes and fight in a classic arcade beat em up way.

game.name: Joe And Mac - Caveman Ninja
game.desc: Joe and Mac: Caveman Ninja is a BoR mod created by Belavi as a tribute to the classic Joe and Mac video game series. The mod manages to capture the original Joe and Mac atmosphere and keeps the entertainment value with its characters and animations.

game.name: Kill Ryu 1
game.desc: Kill Ryu Volume 1 is a BoR mod created by Psmagazine as a parody of the movie Kill Bill. The mod features characters from Capcom's classic Street Fighter video games and a playable tutorial.

game.name: Kill Ryu 2
game.desc: Kill Ryu Volume 2 is a BoR mod created by Psmagazine, it is a continuation with the parody of the movie Kill Bill. The mod picks up where Kill Ryu Volume 1 left off, it also features characters from Capcom's classic Street Fighter video games and a playable tutorial.nnnn

game.name: Lift
game.desc: Save skyscrapers from evil robots group called Falcor!nnPlay as Light Intelligent Falcor Terminator and terminatennFalcor for good!

game.name: Marvel - First Alliance
game.desc: Marvel First Alliance is an indie game developed by ZVitor, created with the popular OpenBor engine, that crossover many aspects of the Marvel universe. The game is a beat'em up inspired by the likes of Streets of Rage and Double Dragon and features a dream team that will certainly please any Marvel fan. But best of all, it features simultaneous four-player action in one computer!

game.name: Strider X
game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters from Strider

game.name: Bad School Girls
game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters from Bad School Japan Anime

game.name: Ninja Stealth Assassins
game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters from Ninja and MK

game.name: Rescue Command Against the Amazon Girls
game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters from the Amazon girls anime

game.path: ./Art Of Fighting - Trouble In South Town.pak
game.name: Art Of Figting - Trouble In South Town
game.desc: - The game is similiar to final fight or streets of rage series. - It contains several levels like fighting / bonus stages / interactive levels... - It uses edited characters from King of Fighters and other arcade games. - It has several animated gifs/movies that will show at the end of each boss/ sequence of levels that will take you throw the story. - Approximately 15/20 hours of gameplay if you play very fast. - And much more.

game.name: Dragon Ball Z - Attack Of The Saiyans
Dreams Of Rage (nightmare On Elm Street)
game.desc: The man of your dreams is back and this time in, full on, 16-bit glory. Fight through an army of Freddy's past victims, hellish nightmares, and Krueger himself as one of the Dream Warriors. Do you have what it takes?

game.name: Monster Girl Dimensions
game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters from Bad School Japan Anime

game.name: Spider-Man & Venom – Maximum Carnage Returns
game.desc: Spider-Man & Venom – Maximum Carnage Returns features the Spider-Man, Venom and Deadpool characters as well as various ninemics from the classic Spider-Man & Venom – Maximum Carnage, originally released in 1994 for Super Nintendo and Mega Drive / SEGA Genesis.

game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters from Bishojo

game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters from Dynasty Warriors

game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters Samurai Warriors

game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters mix games SNK/NEOGEO series

game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters SoF, MK and Fatal Fury series

game.name: Super Karate Kid
game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters from Karate Kid movie series

game.name: Sreet Fighter Rage: World Olympic Tour
game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters Street Fighter seires

game.name: Avengers - United Battle Force
game.desc: Avengers: United Battle Force is an remix of the old Captain America and Avengers arcade game with new chars and many cool things. Its a 2 players beat-em-up game, featuring Avengers plus some guest chars from Marvel universe. 17 playable characters (+ unlockable characters) 20 supporting characters (between NPC and helpers) 3 chapters, with more than 15 stages Many special powers, including devastating Hyper Moves Alternative route Alternative mode for some characters Bonus stages and aerial stages Intense boss fights 10+ bosses Many items and traps Custom voiced characters Custom loading screens Unique feature - Music tempo changes based on boss life. Works like in Street Fighter 2.

game.name: Guardian Heroes - Warpath
game.desc: 8 playable characters Branching Paths Multiple Endings Rideable Creatures Important!: when mapping buttons make sure you use attack2 because the 2 attack buttons become combos.

game.path: ./Mass Effect - Dark Corners of the Galaxy [Ver. Demo][v.3.0 Build 4086].pak

game.desc: A 2D fighting forces with all great characeters Retro Glory Day's

game.name: Alien Vs Predator - Aftermath
game.desc: Aliens vs Predator: Aftermath is a remix of the original arcade game, featuring 4 playable characters, new levels, rain effects, and loads of aliens!

game.path: ./Legend of the Double Dragon v1.5 Cinematic Edition.pak
game.name: Legend of the Double Dragon
game.desc: The game tries to give a cinematic view to the untold story of Return of Double Dragon, the Japanese version of Super Double Dragon, based on the original vision of Mr. Muneki Ebinuma, original Technos producer of the 90's game. The Best bro's edition uses SNES music and cuts the cinematics.
